home.title: Welcome to {brand}
home.subtitle: Track and understand your medical test results with AI-powered insights
home.ctaSectionSubtitle: Join thousands of users who trust MediTrack with their health data

toast.getStarted: Welcome! Let's get you started with MediTrack.
toast.learnMore: Learn more about our features and benefits!

about.title: About {brand}
about.desc: MediTrack helps users track and understand their medical test results easily.
about.missionDesc: We're building the future of personal health management, making it easier for everyone to take control of their health journey.

login.title: Welcome to MediTrack
login.subtitle: Sign in to your account or create a new one
login.name: Full Name
login.loginError: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
login.signupSuccess: Account created successfully! Please sign in.
login.passwordMismatch: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
login.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
login.signupError: Failed to create account. Please try again.

terms.title: Terms & Policy
terms.subtitle: Please read and accept our terms and policies to continue
terms.agreementSuccess: Thank you for accepting our terms and policies!

tos.title: Terms of Service
tos.p1: By using MediTrack, you agree to these terms of service. Our platform provides medical test result analysis and health insights based on the data you provide.
tos.p2: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of any changes.

rights.title: User Rights & Responsibilities
rights.p1: You have the right to access, modify, and delete your personal data at any time. You are responsible for providing accurate information and maintaining the security of your account.
rights.p2: You must not use the service for any illegal purposes or attempt to access other users' data.
rights.i1: Access and manage your personal information
rights.i2: Request deletion of your data at any time
rights.i3: Provide accurate information and keep your credentials secure
rights.i4: Do not misuse the service or violate applicable laws

privacy.title: Privacy & Data Protection
privacy.p1: Your privacy is important to us. We collect and process your data in accordance with applicable privacy laws and our privacy policy.
privacy.p2: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information and test results.

disclaimer.title: Medical Disclaimer
disclaimer.p1: MediTrack provides analysis and insights based on your test results for educational purposes only. Always consult qualified healthcare professionals for medical advice, diagnosis, and treatment.

sharing.title: Data Sharing Rules
sharing.p1: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties without your explicit consent.
sharing.p2: Your test results and health data are only shared with healthcare providers you authorize or as required by law.
sharing.i1: No sale of personal data without explicit consent
sharing.i2: Sharing only with providers you authorize
sharing.i3: Compliance with legal and regulatory requirements

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.p1: If you have questions about these terms or our privacy policy, please contact us at support@meditrack.com.
contact.p2: For technical support or account-related issues, please visit our help center or contact our support team.

summary.allNormal: All results are within normal range
summary.disclaimer: These are preliminary insights. Consult a medical professional for advice.
